ca.uqac.lif.cep.graphviz

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.cep.graphviz.Graph

  • public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple representation of a directed graph
    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©

    • Field Detail

      • m_edges

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Set<Graph.Edge>> m_edges
        A collection of directed edges in this graph. Edges are indexed by source node to facilitate lookup.

      • m_edgeLabels

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> m_edgeLabels
        A map associating edge labels to numbers

      • m_inWeights

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float> m_inWeights
        A map associating vertex labels to the sum of the weights on its incoming edges. Since edges are stored by source vertex, computing the input degree would require looping through every source vertex to look for a destination vertex, which would be very costly. The alternative is to update a separate map of the input degrees as the graph is manipulated.

      • m_edgeCounter

        protected int m_edgeCounter
        A counter for giving unique numbers to edges

      • m_incrementWeights

        protected boolean m_incrementWeights
        Whether to increment the weights or to replace the weight of an edge with a new value

      • incrementWeight

        public Graph incrementWeight(boolean b)
        Sets whether to increment the weights or to replace the weight of an edge with a new value
        Parameters:
        b - Set to true to increment weights, false to replace
        Returns:
        This graph

      • getOutWeight

        public float getOutWeight(java.lang.String vertex)
        Returns the output weight of a vertex
        Parameters:
        vertex - The vertex
        Returns:
        The output weight, or 0 if the vertex does not exist

      • incrementWeight

        public Graph incrementWeight(java.lang.String source,
                             java.lang.String destination,
                             java.lang.Number weight_increment)
        Increments the weight of an edge in the graph. If the edge does not exist, a new edge is created and its weight is set to weight_increment.
        Parameters:
        source - The source vertex
        destination - The destination vertex
        weight_increment - The amount to add to the edge's weight
        Returns:
        This graph

      • toDot

        public java.lang.String toDot()
        Outputs the graph in DOT format
        Returns:
        A DOT string

        Renders an edge. Override this method to customize the rendering.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The label

      • renderVertex

        public java.lang.String renderVertex(java.lang.String vertex)
        Renders a vertex. Override this method to customize the rendering.
        Parameters:
        vertex - The string corresponding to the vertex to render
        Returns:
        The Graphviz string that goes between the brackets
